item.title: Tweet Sentiment
item.description: A Spark Streaming application for live tweets sentiment analysis, created using Scala to continuously read data from Twitter about a topic.

item.description: A Machine Learning model built using Kaggle data which can be used to predict the final price of a house based on the features.

item.title: Kinship
item.description: ‘Kinship’ is a simple tool that finds out what are the related words (kins) to a particular word that twitter users have twitted.

item.description: Third iteration of my personal website built with Gatsby and hosted with Netlify on GitHub Pages.

item.title: Movie Search
item.description: Movies Search based on self-implemented TF-IDF values and Cosine-Similarity computed using movie plot summaries data taken from CMU Movie Summary Corpus.

item.title: Airport Rank
item.description: Rank top airports based on self-implemented Page Rank values computed using their connections data from Bureau of Transportation Statistics.

item.title: News Topic Modelling
item.description: News Topic modelling with Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) by scraping news articles from CNN News website

item.title: Text2Number
item.description: Implementation of text vectorization. Since most of the statistical algorithms, e.g machine learning and deep learning techniques, work with numeric data, therefore we have to convert text into numbers. Several approaches exist in this regard. The most famous ones are Bag of Words, TF-IDF.

item.description: Created a social network of users liking each other’s posts in a graph structure.

item.description: Finding the crimes cluster in a region using Kmeans clustering as silhouette.

item.description: Classify cars as automatic or manual. Predict mileage of cars.

item.title: Sentiment on US Airline
item.description: Analyzing sentiment on US Airlines with Logistic Regression, Random Forest classifier, Naive-Bayes classifier using tweets data on US Airline.

item.title: Sentiment of a sentence
item.description: Used dataset of labelled sentences to learn a model and use the same to analyze the sentiment of new sentences.

item.title: Earthquakes
item.description: Fetch data from USGS and plot on a map the areas across the world that had a 4.5+ earthquake in the last 24 hours.

item.title: High Temperature Anomaly
item.description: Fetch data from NASA and plot on a map the areas in California that are prone to having active fires due to a high temperature anomaly.

item.description: Creating a recommender systems using Collaborative filtering on ratings data with Alternating least squares (ALS) algorithm

item.description: Support Vector Machine (SVM) Classifier model with Stochastic Gradient Decent (SGD) using Principal Component Analysis and Spectral Clustering.

item.title: Ensemble Methods
item.description: Self-implementation of Ensemble methods - Bagging and Boosting - on Decision Tree ID3 algorithm and comparing it with Scikit Learn implementation using Mushroom Data Set.

item.title: Decison Tree ID3
item.description: Self-implementation of Decision Tree ID3 algorithm and comparing it with Scikit Learn implementation using MONK’s Problem and Tic-Tac-Toe Endgame Data Set.

item.description: Diagnosing and predicting Breast Cancer with Support Vector Machine using Wisconsin Breast Cancer diagnostic data set.
